segments.text: I wish I knew who had moved our flower pots .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was me . I am so sorry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did you think you were doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had to move it , so that I can get my bike through .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How dare you be so inconsiderate ? That's wrong .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am awfully sorry . I didn't think you would mind so much .
segments.speaker: S2
